about_the_game:
DREADZONE

The year is 2030, and humanity is on the brink of collapse. A devastating virus, Zeno-29, has swept across the globe, transforming the infected into horrifying mutants and leaving society in ruins. To contain the outbreak, governments have created thousands of isolated zones—quarantined wastelands where the infected are sent to live out their final days.

You are one of the infected. Sent to a remote, desolate zone filled with abandoned factories, crumbling houses, underground hideouts, and wild, untamed terrain, survival is your only option. Supplies are scarce, danger lurks around every corner, and the virus is slowly taking hold of you.

Survive

Scavenge for resources in abandoned factories, crumbling houses, and gather in untamed wilderness. Craft tools, collect food and build shelter to stay alive as you navigate a zone filled with dangerous wild animals, relentless zombies and mutants, and desperate survivors. The zone itself is unforgiving, with constant threats around every corner, as desperation drives everyone to do whatever it takes to survive.

Your Path

Some will focus solely on surviving their remaining days, prioritizing basic needs and safety. Others will seek to explore the zone, uncovering its hidden secrets and discovering forgotten remnants of the world. For the daring, escaping the zone might become the ultimate goal.

content_descriptors.notes: Dreadzone features intense violence, gore, and nudity. Naked mutants expose mature body parts, and bodies can show bloody bullet holes, mutilation, and dismemberment. Players will encounter bloodied corpses of zombies, humans, and animals.

name: DREADZONE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 5-5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX-2060 or AMD RX-6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K or AMD Ryzen 7-7700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX-3070 or AMD RX-7700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Dreadzone is a survival game set in a deadly quarantine zone. Scavenge for resources, craft tools, build shelter, and survive against dangerous animals, zombies, mutants, and other survivors. Explore the zone where desperation drives everyone to do whatever it takes to survive.
